name: Silo 64
overview: The Earth has been destroyed by nuclear Armageddon. Your family, as well as other families in your home town, took refuge in the local underground fallout shelter, Silo 64. Only your trusty robo-companion is all that's left of your life before the blast. All your rations and supplies have been depleted. There's just one thing left to do... Venture out, and seek your fortune in the wasteland! A SEUCK based shooter created by Seth D. Sternberger and published by Oldergames in 2005.
